name: Beep 'N' Zap: Barry's Special
description:
Beep 'n' Zap: Barry's Special How to Play

Click on ingredients to put them in your mixture. Once you have 3 ingredients you can either mix and serve them, or throw them away and try again. Your goal is to serve each patron a mixture that they enjoy.

Play more Beep 'N' Zap games here!
